# Vendored: @nick/lz4

Source: https://jsr.io/@nick/lz4
Version: 0.3.4
License: MIT

## Update

```bash
# Install latest from JSR
npx jsr add @nick/lz4

# Copy updated files
cp node_modules/@nick/lz4/lib/lz4.js node_modules/@nick/lz4/lib/lz4.internal.js vendor/lz4/

# Clean up
rm -rf node_modules/.deno node_modules/@nick
```
